Interface BUser

All Known Implementing Classes:
User
public interface BUser
extends org.bukkit.entity.Player

This project was created under a custom license. From here on out the term "author", refers to - Sabersamus - the author of this project. From here on out the term "plugin" or "project" refers to the Bukkit plugin coded for the author's personal server Bytecraft. You may use the code found in this project for personal use so long as you give credit the author of the class, somewhere within your code. If you want to add onto this project, you must contact me at my email address as shown in the java docs.

Author:
Sabersamus

Method Detail

hasBalance

@EntityData(entityType=PLAYER,
            dataType=BOOLEAN)
boolean hasBalance()
This tells you if the User has an account

Returns:
- true if they have an account, false if they don't

            entityType=PLAYER)
